001package net.tvburger.jdl.cnn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.shapes.Shape2D;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.Kernel;
006
007public class ConvolutionalKernel extends ConvolutionalShape implements Kernel {
008
009    private final Shape2D kernelSize;
010    private final Array<Float> weights;
011
012    public ConvolutionalKernel(Shape2D kernelSize, int channels, int count, Array<Float> weights) {
013        super(kernelSize.getWidth(), kernelSize.getHeight(), channels, count);
014        this.kernelSize = kernelSize;
015        this.weights = weights;
016    }
017
018    public Shape2D getKernelSize() {
019        return kernelSize;
020    }
021
022    public Array<Float> getWeights() {
023        return weights;
024    }
025}
